level.heading: Penalties.
level.text: Except as provided in ยง 32-131.09(b), an employer who willfully violates the requirements of this chapter shall be subject to a civil penalty of $500 for the 1st offense, $750 for the 2nd offense, and $1000 for the 3rd and each subsequent offense.
